data.name: Gotham City Impostors Free to Play: Character Pack
data.detailed_description:
Gain immediate access to these customization options! Additionally, purchased Loadout items will not become re-locked if you choose to accept a Promotion as you level up!

  • All Body Types
  • All Face Options
  • All Voice Options
data.about_the_game:
Gain immediate access to these customization options! Additionally, purchased Loadout items will not become re-locked if you choose to accept a Promotion as you level up!

  • All Body Types

data.short_description: Loadout Bundles are a great way to accelerate your customization options!

fullgame.name: Gotham City Impostors Free to Play

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1.5 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 7 GB Hard Drive Space
  • Video Card: 256MB dedicated memory DX9 Video Card (GeForce 8600 or ATI X1800 or better)
  • DirectX®: DX9
  • Sound: DX9 compatible Sound Controller
  • Additional: Broadband Internet Connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 7 GB Hard Drive Space
  • Video Card: 512MB DX9 High-Performance Video Card (GeForce 8800 or ATI X1900 or better)
  • DirectX®: DX9
  • Sound: DX9 compatible Sound Controller
  • Additional: Broadband Internet Connection
